title: Travel Troubleshooter: JetBlue lost my wedding dress and won’t reimburse me
summary: The right to a refund is outlined in the Montreal Convention, an international treaty that established rules and limits regarding airline liability for baggage.

title: JetBlue Sells More Embraer E190s & GE Engines Ahead of E-Jet Retirement
summary: JetBlue intends to end Embraer E190 operations in early September. JetBlue intends to replace the E190s with the Airbus A220-300, and the carrier only has nine still in operation as of August 2025.
